name: Dice(for Adventurers)
uri: data:application/json;utf8,{"name": "Die #1", "description": "Dice (for Adventurers) are randomized dice for your adventuring stories. Everytime you refresh the metadata, you will get a new rolled number based on your die. Feel free to use Dice in any way you want.", "image_data": "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' preserveAspectRatio='xMinYMin meet' viewBox='0 0 350 350'><style>.base { fill: white; font-family: serif; font-size: 24px; }   .roll { fill: yellow; font-family: serif; font-size: 48px; text-decoration: underline} .block { fill: red; font-family: serif; font-size: 24px;}</style><rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='black' /><text x='10' y='40' class='base'>D6</text><text x='10' y='175' class='base'>You rolled a:</text><text x='150' y='175' class='roll'>6</text><text x='10' y='325' class='block'>Block: #17539747</text></svg>", "attributes": [ {"trait_type": "Type", "value": "D6"}, {"trait_type": "Roll", "value": "6"}]}

metadata.name: Die #1
metadata.description: Dice (for Adventurers) are randomized dice for your adventuring stories. Everytime you refresh the metadata, you will get a new rolled number based on your die. Feel free to use Dice in any way you want.
metadata.image_data: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' preserveAspectRatio='xMinYMin meet' viewBox='0 0 350 350'><style>.base { fill: white; font-family: serif; font-size: 24px; }   .roll { fill: yellow; font-family: serif; font-size: 48px; text-decoration: underline} .block { fill: red; font-family: serif; font-size: 24px;}</style><rect width='100%' height='100%' fill='black' /><text x='10' y='40' class='base'>D6</text><text x='10' y='175' class='base'>You rolled a:</text><text x='150' y='175' class='roll'>6</text><text x='10' y='325' class='block'>Block: #17539747</text></svg>
